content.subject: Your new privacy settings on Play
content.body:
Hello Kashaf,


Now that you’ve added your account to your device, we’d like to share more  
information on how to manage your privacy settings on Play. We’ve updated  
settings that manage personalization and activity history on Google Play.  
<https://support.google.com/googleplay/answer/13780792>Learn more about  
Play personalization and Play History

These settings were previously managed by Web & App Activity in your Google  
Account, but now they’re managed directly on Play. You decide what kind of  
information is saved to your Google Account’s Play History and whether you  
receive a more personalized experience on Play. In Web & App Activity you  
chose to receive more personalized experiences in Google services,  
including Play. Your new Play settings match those preferences, which means  
you’re currently getting a more personalized experience on Play.

You can change these settings in  
<https://myactivity.google.com/product/google_play/personalization>Personalization  
in Play at any time. When saving Play History, you can also choose how long  
data is saved before it’s automatically deleted or manually delete your  
data from your Google Account’s Play History at any time. Going forward,  
Web & App Activity and these Play settings will be separate, and changes to  
one won’t affect the other.

Thanks for using Google Play!

Should you have any questions please visit our  
<https://notifications.google.com/g/p/ANiao5oRRq0eA50bEW-9D6N8upfeW0HxV9wA8lODs7ab7yXcEGdX4w9LZlb2nqrA_AOfq5sTY9uOrLIo_xwFMd0jwS-ZJjgn5mC31z45ySqgAxrUqqKmZffjVnKgDTHP0n98QE9pfdosCDug9oLl6zGrTWp1YmCRbF08dSqMA7Xh5VNswNToSKdgkyO_7XMQQBZfbSS8OD-Pq1ZDTswBPvMSZhz0fTytvSaU8B9Cuqv7IWUnQpnDg9wizn3gEdkfy8s19Tz4>Help  
Center or get in  
<https://notifications.google.com/g/p/ANiao5ppRjSyPEnzO-QKibVlGE7VlQnOpxw-BlC0rQ5RFGPruxzVOep0mY6k5PZGJtQZw5w_MzhxnoTKwfDhzX-oDXDtjuShn1EldBJkXI3-ys2a41YodB0UXVbY_V1G4hq9PGv9I2iNjQ-mgDIpPPpC9LzqIX5KmMzPgceOJhZncoAmd2wWyr1lwTjIiP7HRueIo8GA02qPiQAJDRdUCrqh0h8gFje2Ga3nZFtMLCCzlij7WNdoYEDQ94BfFIAh>touch .

© 2026 Google LLC 1600 Amphitheatre Parkway, Mountain View, CA 94043

You have received this mandatory email service announcement to update you  
about important changes to your Play product or account.

Please do not reply to this email, as we are unable to respond from this  
email address. If you need support, please visit the  
<https://support.google.com/googleplay>Google Play Help Center .
